title: Raffles
description:
12 x 30 mins - 2 Series

The characters of Raffles, the gentleman thief and his friend Bunny were created by the Edwardian author E W Hornung. In these 12 stories, Raffles is played by Jeremy Clyde. Raffles escapes various close shaves with the law, including a period of posing as an Australian invalid, and each story is nicely self contained.

The story of Raffles is brought to a satisfactory conclusion at the end of Series 2, but the unlikely personage of Graham Greene was a great fan, and much later revived Raffles in "The Return of A J Raffles", which was broadcast previously by Auntie Beeb. I found it unsatisfactory as a story, and is not included in this collection of audio dramas.
